Uses of Class
org.cojen.tupl.util.Latch

  • Packages that use Latch 
    Package Description
    org.cojen.tupl.util  

    • Uses of Latch in org.cojen.tupl.util

      Subclasses of Latch in org.cojen.tupl.util 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Clutch
      A clutch is a specialized latch which can support highly concurrent shared requests, under the assumption that exclusive requests are infrequent.
      static class  Clutch.Pack
      Sharable object for supporting contended clutches.
      class  RWLock
      Scalable non-reentrant read-write lock.
      Methods in org.cojen.tupl.util with parameters of type Latch 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int LatchCondition.await​(Latch latch)
      Blocks the current thread indefinitely until a signal is received.
      int LatchCondition.await​(Latch latch, long nanosTimeout)
      Blocks the current thread until a signal is received.
      int LatchCondition.await​(Latch latch, long nanosTimeout, long nanosEnd)
      Blocks the current thread until a signal is received.
      int LatchCondition.await​(Latch latch, long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Blocks the current thread until a signal is received.
      int LatchCondition.awaitShared​(Latch latch, long nanosTimeout, long nanosEnd)
      Blocks the current thread until a signal is received.
      boolean LatchCondition.signalRelease​(Latch latch)
      If a first waiter exists, it's removed, the held exclusive latch is released, and then the waiter is signaled.
      boolean LatchCondition.signalSharedRelease​(Latch latch)
      If a first shared waiter exists, it's removed, the held exclusive latch is released, and then the waiter is signaled.
